content:
I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed Samin Nosrat's show! Here are a few more chef recommendations for you to check out:

1. Alvin Cailan: He is the founder of the popular food event, The Eggslut, and has a YouTube channel called "The Burger Show" that is dedicated to exploring and making different types of burgers. 2. Christina Tosi: The founder of Milk Bar, an award-winning bakery known for its innovative desserts. Tosi has a MasterClass where she teaches how to bake some of her signature desserts. 3. Yotam Ottolenghi: He is a renowned chef and cookbook author who specializes in vegetarian cuisine. He has a strong online presence and shares many of his recipes and cooking tips on social media. 4. Claire Saffitz: A pastry chef and food writer who gained popularity from her time at Bon Appétit's test kitchen. Saffitz's YouTube channel "Gourmet Makes" shows her attempting to recreate popular snacks and treats. I hope you enjoy checking out some of these chefs and their content!
